resources.string: \t Drivers are most likely to experience drowsiness due to the hours of driving, stress, and even workplace issues. The Driver Drowsiness Detection System (DDDS) is a tool dedicated especially for drivers who experience drowsiness during working hours in the working environment. This device will aid the road traffic accidents caused by drowsiness of the driver during working hours and within the working environment. With the help of this IoT integrated system, this will allow drivers to avoid road traffic accidents because of that it reduces the amount of road traffic accidents that happen every year.

\t In this project aims to detect the drowsiness of the driver, specifically eye actions. By using a detection system, the project will determine if the driver is in a state of drowsiness or micro-sleep. With audio cues and warning messages, the system can make the driver alert. It will awaken the spirit of the driver plus it can help the driver decide by taking a break .
